description: ProBook is a free e-book reader application for Palm devices. This app has been developed and released at August 2010 by Prolog, Inc. This e-book application primarily receives zip format contents from the database and anyone can download and read his favorite books from this app. Features: * Users of the application are able to change the font and text size displayed. Available fonts are Times New Roman, Arial and Verdana. * Users can adjust screen brightness from within the application. * Pages are turned by tapping or dragging the page. * Users can bookmark any page of a book. * User can download his favorite books from a great collection of e-books from different authors. * After downloading the books, user can save it to the bookshelf. * User can give feedback about the app and he can also share it his friends.* Delete ebooks from the and bookshelf * Search download list and bookself * See the description * Go to page number.
